id.description: Unique identifier for the demographic answer record

free_form_text.description: Any additional free form text provided as part of the answer

application_id.description: Unique identifier for the application associated with the demographic answer

demographic_question_id.description: Unique identifier for the demographic question answered

demographic_answer_option_id.description: Unique identifier for the selected answer option for the demographic question

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the demographic answer was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the demographic answer was last updated
